channel.title: Benchmarks on Light Rest 4J
channel.description: Recent content in Benchmarks on Light Rest 4J

item.title: Benchmark
item.description: One of the major goals to design light-*-4j frameworks is to provide a Java EE alternative with lower latency, higher throughput and smaller memory footprint. We basically achieved this goal and beyond. Internally, we maintain a microservices benchmark with all the popular microservices frameworks. There are third party test from TechEmpower from Round 14 with a version that is not even optimized. Note that it is called light-java in that benchmark and later we have changed name to light-4j.
